site.title: Aryan Patel | Mission Punsari 2026
site.description: The official website of Aryan Patel documenting the transformation of Punsari village.

hero.description: Transforming Punsari into a Global Benchmark where technology meets tradition.

leader.name: Aryan Patel
leader.quote: Development is not a favor to the people; it is the duty of the leadership.
leader.heading: The Architect of Modern Governance
leader.bio1: Under the visionary guidance of the Patel family, Punsari transitioned from a debt of ₹1 Lakh in 2006 to a surplus of ₹75 Lakhs today, without a single penny from NGOs or NRI funding.
leader.bio2: Aryan Patel believes in **Land Monetization** and **Self-Sustainability**. By auctioning panchayat land for residential use, he generated the seed capital needed to build RO plants, smart schools, and digital grids.

features.title: Revenue Innovation
features.desc: Utilizing 95% tax collection efficiency for local development projects.

features.title: Safe Village
features.desc: Zero theft recorded since 2021 due to tech-driven surveillance.

items.title: Pure RO Water
items.desc: Mineral water at ₹4/20L. 100% piped connectivity to every home.

items.title: Digital Education
items.desc: Smart boards, zero-dropout rate, and air-conditioned libraries.

items.title: Atal Express
items.desc: Village bus service. Free for students, ₹3 for others per trip.

items.title: Smart Broadcast
items.desc: 120 speakers connected to the Sarpanch office for live updates.

items.title: Women Economic Wing
items.desc: 111 Sakhi Mandals empowering 1200+ rural women entrepreneurs.

items.title: Safe Governance
items.desc: 24x7 CCTV monitoring for streets, schools, and public assets.

testimonials.title: Voices of The Village.
testimonials.subtitle: Stories from the residents who built this dream together with Aryan Patel.

list.quote: Atal Express has changed the lives of women in our dairy sector...
list.author: Sunita Ben

list.quote: Our kids now study in air-conditioned smart schools...
list.author: Ramjibhai Kaka

stats.title: Financial Discipline.
stats.quote: Punsari does not rely on foreign aid. We believe in the power of Indian villages to generate their own wealth through smart administration.

questions.a: No. All projects are funded through Government schemes and the Panchayat's own generated income (Land auction & Taxes).

questions.q: How is the water so affordable?
questions.a: We run our RO plants on a no-profit model. The electricity is subsidized by our village solar grid.
Yes. Our 'Punsari Model' is a standard framework being studied by the World Bank and other state governments.

questions.q: How do you achieve Zero Dropout?
questions.a: By providing free bus transport, digital engagement, and regular parent-teacher transparency.

strategy.quote: "GIS mapping ensures every household is within a 5-minute reach of essential village infrastructure."

terrain.title: Plateau
terrain.description: Natural topography engineered for efficiency. Every ward is integrated with gravity-driven drainage.

climate.title: Climate Audit
climate.desc: Operating in a semi-arid zone, Punsari achieves year-round production through 73 recharge wells and crop rotation.
climate.soilDesc: ISO verified soil health profile providing the perfect foundation for Golden Wheat exports and Long-staple Cotton.

items.d: High-yield Rabi harvest variety via automated canal networks.
Primary Cash Crop contributing to 60% of village agri-revenue.
Winter seed rotation ensuring 100% land utility.

timeline.title: Establishment
timeline.desc: Punsari Gram Panchayat was officially formed, starting with basic administrative roots.

timeline.title: The Revolution
timeline.desc: Shri Himanshu Patel took charge at age 23. The vision for 'City Facilities' was born.

timeline.title: Digital Leap
timeline.desc: Village became 100% Wi-Fi enabled and secured via a full CCTV network.

timeline.title: Mission Surplus
timeline.desc: Under Aryan Patel, the village achieved ₹75L surplus with 100% literacy.

featuredCard.heading: Zero External Funding.
featuredCard.description: Punsari does not rely on NRIs or NGOs. Our economy is built on local tax efficiency (95%), land monetization, and a thriving dairy ecosystem.

pillars.title: Dairy
pillars.desc: Daily milk collection through automated cooperatives.

pillars.title: RO Plant
pillars.desc: Self-sustaining water model with daily cash surplus.

pillars.title: Retail
pillars.desc: Panchayat shopping centres run by Sakhi Mandals.

pillars.title: Transport
pillars.desc: Atal Express revenue covers 100% of fuel costs.

breakingNews.title: Punsari Leads National Digital Literacy Rankings 2026
breakingNews.desc: Under Aryan Patel's leadership, Punsari achieves 100% digital proficiency among youth and elders alike.

breakingNews.title: ISO 9001:2026 Re-Certification Awarded To Gram Panchayat
breakingNews.desc: Official auditors praise the transparency and data management systems of the Punsari Strategic Cell.

breakingNews.title: New Waste-To-Energy Plant Operationalized
breakingNews.desc: The ₹85 Lakh plant starts generating electricity for the village street-light grid.

newsGrid.title: Women Entrepreneurs Scaling Dairy Operations
newsGrid.desc: 111 Sakhi Mandals report a 40% increase in monthly revenue following the latest automation workshop led by the Strategic Cell.

newsGrid.title: Atal Express Buses Go Electric This Quarter
newsGrid.desc: To further sustainability, the village council approves the transition of the student bus fleet to zero-emission electric vehicles.

newsGrid.title: Smart Schools Achieve 100% Digital Proficiency
newsGrid.desc: A milestone reached: Every student from Std VI to VIII has successfully cleared the 'Basic Coding & Web Design' certification.

newsGrid.title: New RO Plant Extension For Industrial Ward
newsGrid.desc: Construction begins for the third RO water purification unit to meet the rising demand for purified water in the upcoming dairy cluster.

newsGrid.title: Sabarkantha District Praises Punsari's Solar Model
newsGrid.desc: District officials visit Punsari to study how the village-wide solar street lighting system has cut electricity costs by 85%.

newsGrid.title: Public Address System Upgrade Completed
newsGrid.desc: 120 new high-fidelity waterproof speakers installed across all village internal roads for seamless live news and emergency broadcasts.

footer.description: Punsari Gram Panchayat is India's No.1 self-reliant "Smart Village". We believe in professional administration and transparent governance.
